doc:
Linda Ercoli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linda_Ercoli 0 Linda M. Ercoli (born March 7, 1960 in California) is an American actress and singer. As a child she was regularly featured as one of the voice actors (actresses) in the Peanuts cartoons, playing various parts in the films and television specials. She provided the voice of Violet in You're Not Elected, Charlie Brown, and Be My Valentine, Charlie Brown (and also the voice of Frieda). Ercoli also voiced Peppermint Patty in It's the Easter Beagle, Charlie Brown, and Clara in the second Peanuts movie Snoopy, Come Home. She voiced Violet again in Happy Anniversary, Charlie Brown. Linda_M._Ercoli ( born March_7_,_1960 in California ) is an_American_actress_and_singer . As a_child she was_regularly_featured as one of the_voice_actors ( actresses ) in the_Peanuts_cartoons , playing various_parts in the_films_and_television_specials . She provided the_voice of Violet in You 're_Not_Elected , Charlie_Brown , and Be My_Valentine_,_Charlie_Brown_( and also the_voice of Frieda_) . Ercoli also voiced Peppermint_Patty in It 's the_Easter_Beagle , Charlie_Brown , and Clara in the_second_Peanuts_movie_Snoopy , Come Home . She voiced Violet_again in Happy_Anniversary , Charlie_Brown .
